page.title: 15ANNUAL EVENTS in RHAYADER
page.content: There are{three annual events}in which the whole community takes part. {Carnival Week}in late July when enter- tainments are staged by various organ- isations.This year's programme included Treasure Hunts,Concerts,Tug of War,Barbeque, Gwastedyn Hill Race, Open Air Party and Discos and Dances, ending on Saturday with the Carnival Procession and the Crowning of the Carnival Queen and Princess. In mid- December a{Christmas Tree}from the Elan Valley is erected in the town centre and in the week before Christmas large numbers of townspeople gather round it to sing traditional carols. After Christmas an{Amateur {Pantomime}is staged.All age groups take part from the children's chorus through the junior and adult's choruses to principals and stage staff often in the 50 to 70 year age group.
